description: Detects a remote file copy attempt to a hidden network share. This may indicate lateral movement or data staging activity.
author: Tim Rauch
false_positives: Other programs that cause these patterns (please report)
name: Privilege Escalation via Named Pipe Impersonation
query: (((process.executable.text:(*\\cmd.exe OR *\\powershell.exe)) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:("Cmd.Exe" OR "PowerShell.EXE"))) AND (process.command_line.text:*echo* AND process.command_line.text:*>* AND process.command_line.text:*\\\\.\\pipe\\*))
